recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.summary: A hearty chicken curry with coconut milk
instructions: Dice the onion and garlic, and sauté in oil until translucent.
Add the curry powder and stir for about 1 minute.
Add the chicken breast pieces and fry until they are golden on all sides.
Pour in the coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add salt to taste.
recipes.notes: Serve with rice or naan bread for a complete meal.

recipes.name: Beef Stir-Fry
recipes.summary: Quick and easy beef stir-fry with vegetables
instructions: Slice the beef into thin strips.
Cut the bell peppers into bite-sized pieces.
Heat the oil in a pan and fry the beef until browned.
Add the ginger and bell peppers, and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Pour in the soy sauce and stir well.
Add salt to taste.
recipes.notes: You can add other vegetables like broccoli or carrots.

recipes.name: Vegetable Lasagna
recipes.summary: A cheesy, vegetarian lasagna loaded with vegetables
instructions: Precook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
Sauté spinach and mushrooms until cooked.
Layer noodles, ricotta, vegetables, tomato sauce, and mozzarella in a baking dish.
Repeat the layering process until all ingredients are used.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
recipes.notes: Allow to cool for 10 minutes before serving to help it set.

recipes.name: Salmon Teriyaki
recipes.summary: Delicious and easy to make salmon with teriyaki sauce
instructions: Marinate the salmon in teriyaki sauce for at least 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
Cook salmon on each side for about 4 minutes.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving.
recipes.notes: Serve with steamed rice and vegetables for a complete meal.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.summary: A healthy and trendy breakfast or snack option
instructions: Toast the bread slices to your preferred doneness.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly on the toasted bread.
recipes.notes: Top with radishes, tomatoes, or sprouts for added flavor and texture.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato Soup
recipes.summary: A creamy and comforting sweet potato soup
instructions: Peel and chop the sweet potatoes and onion.
Sauté onion and garlic in a large pot until translucent.
Add sweet potatoes and vegetable broth, bring to a boil, then simmer until potatoes are soft.
Puree the mixture in a blender or use an immersion blender until smooth.
Stir in cream, and season with salt and pepper to taste.
recipes.notes: Garnish with fresh herbs or a dollop of sour cream before serving.

recipes.name: Quinoa Salad
recipes.summary: A light and refreshing salad with quinoa and mixed vegetables
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions and let cool.
Chop cucumber and halve cherry tomatoes.
Combine quinoa, cucumber, tomatoes, and crumbled feta cheese in a large bowl.
Dress with olive oil and lemon juice, and toss to combine.
recipes.notes: Add fresh herbs like parsley or mint to enhance the flavor.

recipes.name: Baked Cod with Lemon Butter
recipes.summary: Tender cod fillets baked with a rich lemon butter sauce
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C.
Melt butter in a saucepan, add minced garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Place cod fillets in a baking dish, and pour the lemon butter sauce over them.
Bake for 12-15 minutes or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.
Garnish with chopped parsley before serving.
recipes.notes: Serve with steamed vegetables or a side salad for a complete meal.
